pagination.no_authorization: You are not the author of the command

configure.title: How to configure?
configure.description:
To enable the command `/servers consult` on your discord server, use `/servers add` to configure it, in a channel.

The bot can post new articles in english or/and french, about your favorites games, in a specified channel. To configure it, use `/feeds add` in a channel.

how_to_fork.title: How to contribute?
how_to_fork.description: The source code for this bot is available on our GitHub account. You can contribute freely to add new features to the mTxServ bot.

add.not_logged:
To add your server, 
__you must have connected your__ mTxServ account with `/login`, to verify use `/me`.
add.cant_fetch: Can't connect to your mTxServ account.
add.no_result: You didn't have any game server on your account.
add.description_select: Selected server(s) will be available with the `/servers` command.
add.interaction_end: If you want to add an other server please, use the command again.
add.success: Game(s) server(s) added, use `/servers` to view server status!

remove.no_result: You didn't have any game server registered on this server.
remove.description_select: Selected server(s) will be removed from the `/servers` command.
remove.interaction_end: If you want to remove an other server please, use the command again.

consult.no_result: You didn't have any game server registered on this server.
consult.no_result_description:
__To add your server__, use the command `/server add`.
__You must have connected your__ mTxServ account with `/login`, to verify use `/me`.
